channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tim Ballard’s Claims to Fight Sex Trafficking Made Him a MAGA Star. These Women Told Police He Abused Them

item.title: nOps lands $30M to optimize AWS customers’ cloud spend
item.description: nOps sells software designed to "optimize" the budgets that businesses allocate to cloud products and services. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved...

item.title: Paris court explains why it’s arrested Telegram founder, Pavel Durov

item.title: The 32 Best Deals From REI’s 2024 Labor Day Sale
